why: Primary baseline: Table 1 Col 2 triple DID in logs with year + year*below + year*hor FE
Supporting baseline: DID on newly-exempt subsample only with year FE
Never-exempt control group placebo -- tests whether untreated group shows similar effect (should be null)
Triple DID in levels instead of logs -- same hypothesis different functional form
Newly-exempt DID in levels instead of logs -- same hypothesis different functional form
Never-exempt control group placebo in levels -- tests null for untreated group
Triple DID excluding software mergers (SIC 7372) -- sample restriction robustness
Newly-exempt DID excluding software mergers -- sample restriction robustness
Never-exempt placebo excluding software -- control group check
Triple DID in levels excluding software -- sample + functional form variation
Newly-exempt DID in levels excluding software -- sample + functional form variation
Never-exempt placebo in levels excluding software -- control group check
Triple DID excluding mergers >= $150MM -- sample restriction robustness
Newly-exempt DID excluding large mergers -- sample restriction robustness
Never-exempt placebo excluding large mergers -- control group check
Triple DID in levels excluding large mergers -- sample + functional form variation
Newly-exempt DID in levels excluding large mergers -- sample + functional form variation
Never-exempt placebo in levels excluding large mergers -- control group check
Dollar value of mergers instead of count -- different outcome variable testing different claim
Dollar value DID on newly-exempt -- different outcome variable
Dollar value DID on never-exempt -- placebo on different outcome
Dollar value triple DID in levels -- different outcome variable
Dollar value DID on newly-exempt in levels -- different outcome variable
Dollar value DID on never-exempt in levels -- placebo on different outcome
Triple DID with 3-year symmetric window (1998-2004) -- time window restriction
Newly-exempt DID with 3-year symmetric window -- time window restriction
Triple DID with 4-year symmetric window (1997-2005) -- time window restriction
Newly-exempt DID with 4-year symmetric window -- time window restriction
Triple DID with 5-year symmetric window (1996-2006) -- time window restriction
Newly-exempt DID with 5-year symmetric window -- time window restriction
Triple DID with 6-year symmetric window (1995-2007) -- time window restriction
Newly-exempt DID with 6-year symmetric window -- time window restriction
Triple DID with post redefined as year>2000 -- treatment timing variation
Newly-exempt DID with post>2000 -- treatment timing variation
Triple DID with post redefined as year>2002 -- treatment timing variation
Newly-exempt DID with post>2002 -- treatment timing variation
Triple DID with post redefined as year>2003 -- treatment timing variation
Newly-exempt DID with post>2003 -- treatment timing variation
Triple DID replacing year FE with linear time trend -- FE/controls variation
Newly-exempt DID with linear trend instead of year FE -- FE/controls variation
Never-exempt placebo with linear trend -- control group check under different FE
Triple DID in levels with linear trend -- FE + functional form variation
Newly-exempt DID in levels with linear trend -- FE + functional form variation
Triple DID replacing year FE with quadratic time trend -- FE/controls variation
Newly-exempt DID with quadratic trend instead of year FE -- FE/controls variation
Triple DID with classical (non-robust) standard errors -- inference variation
Newly-exempt DID with classical SE -- inference variation
Triple DID in levels with classical SE -- inference + functional form variation
Software (SIC 7372) subsample only for newly-exempt -- heterogeneity analysis
Software subsample for never-exempt -- heterogeneity + placebo
Software subsample in levels for newly-exempt -- heterogeneity analysis
DD on horizontal mergers only (no hor/non-hor comparison) -- different treatment structure collapses triple DID
DD on non-horizontal mergers only -- placebo outcome (should be null or negative)
DD on horizontal mergers only in levels -- different treatment structure
DD on non-horizontal mergers only in levels -- placebo outcome
DD on horizontal share of mergers -- different outcome variable (ratio not level/log)
DD on total mergers (all types combined) -- diagnostic check for overall merger activity
Triple DID excluding 2008-2009 financial crisis -- sample restriction
Newly-exempt DID excluding 2008-2009 -- sample restriction
Triple DID excluding transition year 2001 -- sample restriction
Newly-exempt DID excluding 2001 -- sample restriction
Triple DID using Poisson count model -- estimation method variation
Newly-exempt Poisson DID -- estimation method variation
First differences of log horizontal mergers DD -- functional form variation (first-diff instead of levels)
First differences of log non-horizontal mergers -- placebo (non-horizontal should show no effect)
Placebo timing test with fake treatment at 1997 in pre-period -- should be null
Placebo timing test with fake treatment at 1998 in pre-period -- should be null
Placebo timing test with fake treatment at 1999 in pre-period -- should be null
Triple DID excluding both software and large mergers -- combined sample restriction
Newly-exempt DID excluding software and large mergers -- combined sample restriction
Triple DID with inverse hyperbolic sine transformation -- functional form variation
Triple DID with weighted least squares (weights by merger count) -- estimation method variation
Triple DID with asymmetric window 1994-2005 -- time window restriction
Triple DID with asymmetric window 1994-2007 -- time window restriction
Triple DID with asymmetric window 1997-2011 -- time window restriction
Triple DID with asymmetric window 1999-2011 -- time window restriction
